name: Battlemage VR
description:
As one of the last surviving battlemages it is your duty to cleanse the world of the evil creatures taking over. The magic crystals once hidden and thought to be safe have gotten into the wrong hands and now their powers are being used to spawn monsters. Slay the monsters that plague the lands and retrieve the magic crystals. Collect coin and purchase unique melee and magic weapons. Gain experience from your kills to level up and become an all-powerful battlemage.Notable Features
  • Melee and magic weapons
  • Teleportation and sliding locomotion
  • Third person camera controls
  • Full body IK
  • Gain XP, level up, and spend skill points
  • Light character customization
  • Unique combination of image effects and anti-aliasing techniques yield vibrant high quality graphics and good performance.
